sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { DatePicker, Form, Input, Radio, notification } from 'antd'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const FormChangeContact = ({ }) => { const [form] = Form.useForm(); const [results, setResults] = useState({}); const getContact = async () => { const res = await fetch('/api/contact') const json = await res.json() form.setFieldsValue({ phone: json.data.phone, facebook: json.data.facebook, instagram: json.data.instagram, linkedin: json.data.linkedin, address: json.data.address, instagram: json.data.instagram, }); } const handleSubmit = async (values) => { const res = await fetch('/api/contact', { method: 'post', body: JSON.stringify(values) }) }; useEffect(() => { getContact() }, []) console.log(results) return (
); }; export default FormChangeContact;
